backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining door entry types (CoatingType, DoorEntry, AddDoorInput) and CRUD operations (addDoor, getAll, getTotals, deleteDoor) with square feet calculation and in-memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features for updating GrandTotals.tsx, pdfGenerator.ts, and whatsappShare.ts to calculate and display all four coating type amounts using sqFt × rate logic with proper formatting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of all frontend files describing components, utilities, and hooks for door quotation app with coating type calculations, fraction parsing, dimension rounding, and export functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with wood-inspired warm palette for construction industry aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tags and root div for React app mounting with title 'Door Measurement & Quotation App'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component orchestrating customer info form, door entry form, door list, grand totals, quotation actions, and theme toggle with state management for customer data and refresh triggers.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: Card component with icon-enhanced input fields for capturing customer name and mobile number with controlled state passed via props.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: Form component for adding door entries with fraction/decimal dimension parsing that automatically creates all 4 coating type entries (single, double, doubleSagwan, laminate) for each submitted door size using rounded dimensions.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryList.ts: Displays a table of door entries grouped by size with calculated coating costs (single, double, double sagwan, laminate) and totals. Supports deleting grouped entries and refreshing data.
frontend/src/components/GrandTotals.tsx: Shows grand totals card with total square feet and calculated amounts for all coating types across all door entries. Displays loading and error states with retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/QuotationActions: Provides buttons to generate PDF quotations and share via WhatsApp, requiring customer info and door entries. Clears all data after successful generation or sharing.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Simple button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on door entries including getAll, getTotals, addDoor, deleteDoor, and deleteAll with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages theme state (light/dark) with localStorage persistence and system preference detection, applying theme class to document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a wood-inspired color palette in light and dark modes, plus utility classes for touch-friendly targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/coatingRates.ts: Exports coating rate constants (Single: 185, Double: 220, Double Sagwan: 270, Laminate: 450) and provides functions to get rates by coating type and calculate all coating amounts for given square footage.
frontend/src/utils/dimensionRounding.ts: Provides functions to round door heights and widths to standard Indian carpenter sizes based on threshold rules (e.g., height ≤72→72, width ≤30→30).
frontend/src/utils/fractionParser.ts: Parses and validates door dimension inputs supporting decimal and fraction formats (e.g., '78 2/8'), converts decimals to fraction display, and validates Indian standard fractions (eighths).
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates HTML quotation documents by grouping door entries by size, calculating all four coating type amounts for each door, and formatting totals with proper rupee formatting.
Calculates square feet from rounded door dimensions using the formula: (roundedHeight × roundedWidth) / 144.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Generates WhatsApp-formatted quotation messages with all four coating type calculations per door and totals, supporting Web Share API with PDF file attachment fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, custom fonts, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural notes about coating calculations, existing features for grand totals and PDF/WhatsApp exports, and new feature requests for DoorEntryList updates.
